Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕੌਣ ਹੈ ਜਿਸਨੂੰ ਅੱਜ ਸੋਹਣੇ ਦਾ ਇਸ਼ਕ ਸਵਾਰ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The kings abrogated their entire empires, So that

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: They could understand and realize the mysteries and tempo of love. (50) (8)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਮੈਣ ਜਾਣਦਾ ਹਾਣ, ਐ ਸ਼ੋਖ ਮਾਸ਼ੂਕ # ਕਿ ਤੂ ਦੋ ਜਹਾਨਾਣ ਦਾ ਖ਼ੂਨ ਕਰੇਗਾ,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Anyone who has been struck by the love-bug (disease), like Goyaa,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿਉਣ ਜੋ ਤੇਰੀ ਮਸਤ ਅੱਖ ਅੱਜ ਨਸ਼ੇ ਨਾਲ ਭਰੀ ਹੌਈ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: He has not seen any other ointment except submission and the meditation of (the Naam of) Waaheguru. (50) (9)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਿਗਰ ਦੇ ਖ਼ੂਨ ਨੇ ਮੇਰੀ ਅੱਖ ਦੇ ਪੱਲੇ ਨੂੰ ਲਾਲ ਕਰ ਦਿੱਤਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: idil dIvwnwie mw qur&w bhwry dwrd [29[3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The chaste Akaalpurakh, the Protector of all, has given me birth for the reason,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਮੇਰੇ ਦੀਵਾਨੇ ਦਿਲ ਵਿਚ ਕੇਹੀ ਬਹਾਰ ਆਈ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: swXwie qUbw E i&rdOs n^whd hrigz [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: That nothing else but the Naam of the Beneficient should come out of this torso of dust. (51) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਿਸ ਨੂੰ ਮਨਸੂਰ ਵਾਣਗ ਸੂਲੀ ਦਾ ਪਰਛਾਵਾਣ ਪਰਾਪਤ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr ik mnsUr is&q swXwie dwry dwrd [29[4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The state of the heart and soul of your lovers during their separation from you is such,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਨਾ ਤਾਣ ਸੁਰਗ ਦੇ ਬਿਰਛ ਤੂਬਾ ਦੀ ਛਾਣ ਦੀ ਅਤੇ ਨਾ ਹੀ ਸੁਰਗ ਦੀ ਲੋੜ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: rUie gulgUin ^ud AY SmwA br A&rUz dmy [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: That their heart is scarred like a poppy flower and their soul torn apart. (51) (2)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਐ ਦੀਵੇ # ਆਪਣਾ ਲਾਲ ਫੁਲਾਣ ਵਰਗਾ ਮੁਖੜਾ ਕੁਝ ਚਿਰ ਲਈ ਰੋਸ਼ਨ ਕਰ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: idil prvwnw E bulbul b-qU kwry dwrd [29[5[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The time spent without remembering You has been called the 'death',

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿਉਣ ਜੋ ਪਰਵਾਨੇ ਅਤੇ ਬੁਲਬੁਲ ਦੇ ਦਿਲ ਨੂੰ ਤੇਰੇ ਨਾਲ ਕੁਝ ਕੰਮ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
But as long as I am blessed to be under your protection, I have no fear (of death)." (51) (3)
The kings and emperors gave up their thrones and crowns for you, O Guru,
Please take off the veil from your face, because the world is lying dead  (longing to see Your face). (51) (4)
Your heavenly dust blesses the suffering world with healthiness, kindly
Be merciful on the painful conditions of these poor strangers. (51) (5)
It is this world that destroys both the universes,
Kings like blood-thirsty Daaraa were amalgamated with the dust and Kaaroon-like brave men were killed all in the avarice for this world. (51) (6)
Goyaa says, "Without you, O Guru! My eyes always keep dropping pearls like tears (in)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਭਾਵੇਣ ਹਰ ਦੀਵਾਨੇ ਲਈ ਸੰਗਲ ਬਣਾਉਣਦੇ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: idil goXw b ^im zul& krwry dwrd [29[6[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
The same manner that grapes keep falling from their bunches of vines." (51) (7)
Your marvels and feats of skill are perfect, in fact perfection of perfections,
Your beauty is the queen of beauty, you are the beauty of beauties. (52) (1)
My vein of breath is nearest to your ire; this completely surprises my doctor.
Still, what thoughts we nurture about our self, O what thoughts we cherish! (52) (2) 
Goyaa says, "I do not know who I am, nor how I am,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਪਰ ਗੋਯਾ ਦਾ ਦਿਲ ਤਾਣ ਜ਼ੁਲਫ਼ ਦੇ ਫ਼ੰਦੇ ਨਾਲ ਠਹਿਰ ਜਾਣਦਾ ਹੈ ।
